title.native: ブラッククローバー 魔法帝の剣
title.romaji: Black Clover: Mahou Tei no Ken
title.english: Black Clover: Sword of the Wizard King

description:
As a lionhearted boy who can’t wield magic strives for the title of Wizard King, four banished Wizard Kings of yore return to crush the Clover Kingdom.

(Source: Netflix)
synonyms: Black Clover: A Espada do Rei Mago
Black Clover: La espada del rey mago

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Revenge
tags.description: Prominently features a character who aims to exact punishment in a resentful or vindictive manner.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Reincarnation
tags.description: Features a character being born again after death, typically as another person or in another world.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Medieval
tags.description: Partially or completely set in the Middle Ages or a Middle Ages-inspired setting. Commonly features elements such as European castles and knights.

node.description: __Yuuki Tabata__ is a Japanese mangaka, who was previously an assistant under [Toshiaki Iwashiro](https://anilist.co/staff/98048/ToshiakiIwashiro) & [Ryuuhei Tamura](https://anilist.co/staff/102375/RyuuheiTamura).

__Yuuki Tabata__ is a Japanese mangaka, who was previously an assistant under [Toshiaki Iwashiro](https://anilist.co/staff/98048/ToshiakiIwashiro) & [Ryuuhei Tamura](https://anilist.co/staff/102375/RyuuheiTamura).

Treasure (Hangul: 트레저; Japanese: トレジャー; stylized as TREASURE) is a South Korean boy band formed in 2019 by YG Entertainment through the reality-survival program YG Treasure Box. The twelve-piece group equally shares joint leadership among the eldest members, Choi Hyun-suk and Jihoon, and officially made their debut on August 7, 2020 with their single album, The First Step: Chapter One, and its lead single, "Boy".

Affiliated with Mouse.

He is described by his colleagues as someone very efficient with his line work, particularly the speed at which he can make corrections.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/325492584) | [Sakugabooru](https://www.sakugabooru.com/post?tags=tatsuya_yoshihara)

Freelance animator formerly affiliated with [Actas](https://anilist.co/studio/60/) where he was attending its internal animation school and debuted as animator at the age of 20. His work has been greatly influenced by contemporary Kanada school animators [Seiya Numata](https://anilist.co/staff/124320/) and [Hironori Tanaka](https://anilist.co/staff/103979/). 

He's a precocious talent, debuting as episode director at the age of 21 and as director at the age of 23 with [Arve Rezzle](https://anilist.co/anime/13863/), as part of the Young Animator Training Project.

Married to fellow animator [Kikuko Sadakata](https://anilist.co/staff/105769).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/125951990) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/users/877227) | [Fanbox](https://misopetha-menos.fanbox.cc/)

Originating from [Sunshine Corporation](https://anilist.co/studio/7108/).

Close friends with [Shunji Akasaka](https://anilist.co/staff/157902/)

Heavily inspired by [Tatsuya Yoshihara](https://anilist.co/staff/112047/), he follows him in most of his series, such as [Black Clover](https://anilist.co/anime/97940/), [Monster Musume no Iru Nichijou](https://anilist.co/anime/21093/) and [Namiuchigiwa no Muromisan](https://anilist.co/anime/16910/) on which he worked as an Animator, Animation Director or Character Designer.

He is best known for his work as a Chief Animation Director on Black Clover, and he has a deep respect for [Yuuki Tabata](https://anilist.co/staff/110063/)'s art and tries to transmit it in his corrections with his friend [Shunji Akasaka](https://anilist.co/staff/157902/).
Vice President of Mouse. He is responsible for managing the animation side of the studio, including production management and staff supervision.
